definition: property ownership or right/financial power/financial control

sentences.english: A year ago this man assumed control of the company's finance.
sentences.chinese: 一年以前，這個人控制了該公司的財權。

sentences.english: You should have control of your vehicle at all times.
sentences.chinese: 一年以前，這個人控制了該公司的財權。

sentences.english: Lifts the creditor's rights is the standard tax distribution system entrusts with the Local authority proper property rights.
sentences.chinese: 舉債權是規範的分稅制賦予地方政府應有的財權。

sentences.english: The Treasurer refused to let go of the club's purse strings.
sentences.chinese: 財務主管拒絕放棄俱樂部的財權。
